verbose_text: S. cerevisiae Pds5 mutations that suppress the lethality of eco1 mutants and are therefore defective in releasing activity cluster in two domains : the first cluster is found in and around the conserved APDAP loop (116-120 LtPds5 numbering), as well as the nearby and conserved glutamate E181 (Lt : E210).
evidence: Pds5 mutations that suppress the lethality of eco1 mutants
